DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy dutogliptin patient type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) receive background therapy glimepiride without metformin .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Dutogliptin Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus ( T2DM ) Background Therapy With Glimepiride With Without Metformin
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus , diagnose least 3 month prior Screening ( Visit 1 ) BMI 20 48 kg/m2 , inclusive HbA1c 7.0 % 10.0 % , inclusive Age 18 85 year , inclusive Currently 3 oral antidiabetic drug insulin . Type 1 diabetes mellitus
